file_content.text: No!
The entity is vanquished. The life in this body is ebbing. You have done well, my Wrath.
Once I am released, the Hand will know all that has transpired. I cannot be trapped twice.
They will continue to guide you in the effort to ruin Darth Baras's bid.
You are my master in all things.
As you say.
Darth Baras's destruction is all I care about.
That's what I'm living for.
Revenge drives and burns with bright intensity, but it is a mortal fuel that leaves the tank bare.
Your fallen servant has been restored to health. Return to your ship.
Your fallen servants have been restored to health. Return to your ship.
Voss holds no further interest for you. Return to your ship.
This body is expiring....
You're not dying fast enough.
Yeah, yeah, I got it. [Kill]
Wrath. Come to me.
I am your Emperor.
Darth Baras plays the old games. He maneuvered me here, knowing this body could be bound to this place.
I will make Baras pay for every deceit.
He must die.
My exit is paramount.
That's what you get for listening to him.
Serves you right.
How did he do that?
Baras planned my pilgrimage, offered me this body. He knew any Voss who entered this chamber could never leave.
Sel-Makor's dark secrets here are of import, but they will wait.
I must be released. Another time I will return for what I require.
Tell me what must be done.
What can I do?
Can't you just abandon this vessel?
Give up the body.
What are you trying to achieve here?
Require for what?
Ultimate victory.
I am released only when this body dies. An oversight I will not repeat. But for now, the entity Sel-Makor makes suicide impossible.
I will lower my defenses and use my Wrath to kill this body.
I am yours to command.
Anything, master.
It's not every day you get to kill the Emperor.
This is the ultimate rush.
I am ready. Strike me down.
Maybe we're better off without you--this war is yours.
But you stand against peace.
These petty conflicts mean nothing. The concerns of this galaxy are meaningless.
Once I ascend, all will be tranquil in this galaxy. It is my promise to you. Now, strike!
No! Forever bound!
Sel-Makor takes this body! Such... power!
Wrath, I am fighting to wrest control from Sel-Makor. My resistance from within will occupy some of the entity's power--
No! Futility! Mine!
The effort is excruciating. Between the two of us, we can cast him out--
Total power! Destroy your Wrath! Now!
Strike with all your might!
